Verses: 1 piradhaana Aasaariyan Avanai Nokki: Kaariyam Ippadiyaayirukkiradhu Endru Kettaan.

2 adharku Avan: Sagodharare, Pidhaakkale, Kelungal. Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Aabiragaam Kaaraanoorile Kudiyirukkiradharku Munname Mesoppoththaamiyaa Naattile Irukkumbodhu Magimaiyin Dhevan Avanukkuth Dharisanamaagi:
3 nee Un Dhesaththaiyum Un Inaththaiyum Vittup Purappattu, Naan Unakkuk Kaanbikkum Dhesaththukku Vaa Endraar.

4 appozhudhu Avan Kaltheyar Dhesaththaivittup Purappattu, Kaaraanoorile Vaasampanninaan. Avanudaiya Thagappan Mariththapinbu, Avvidaththai Vittu Neengal Ippozhudhu Kudiyirukkira Iththesaththirku Avanai Azhaiththukkondu Vandhu Kudiyirukkumpadi Seydhaar.

5 idhile Oru Adi Nilaththaiyaagilum Avanudaiya Kaiyaatchikkuk Kodaamalirukkaiyil, Avanukkup Pillaiyillaadhirukkumbodhu: Unakkum Unakkup Pinvarum Un Sandhadhikkum Idhaich Sudhandharamaagath Tharuven Endru Avanukku Vaakkuththaththampanninaar.
6 andhappadi Dhevan Avanai Nokki: Un Sandhadhiyaar Anniya Dhesaththil Sanjarippaargal; Athdhesaththaar Avargalai Adimaigalaakki, Naanooru Varusham Thunpappaduththuvaargal.
7 avargalai Adimaippaduththum Janaththai Naan Aakkinaikkutpaduththuven. Adharkuppin Avargal Purappattuvandhu Ivvidaththile Enakku Aaraadhanai Seyvaargal Endraar.

8 melum Viruththasedhana Udanpadikkaiyaiyum Avanukku Erpaduththinaar. Andhappadiye Avan Eesaakkaip Petrapodhu, Ettaam Naalile Avanai Viruththasedhanampanninaan. Eesaakku Yaakkobaiyum, Yaakkobu Pannirandu Koththirappidhaakkalaiyum Petraargal.
9 andha Koththirappidhaakkal Poraamaikondu Yoseppai Egipthukkuk Kondupogumpadiyaaga Vitruppottaargal.

10 dhevano Avanudanekooda Irundhu, Ellaa Ubaththiravangalinindrum Avanai Viduviththu, Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Paarvon Samugaththile Avanukkuk Kirubaiyaiyum Gnaanaththaiyum Arulinaar; Andha Raajaa Avanai Egipthudhesaththirkum Than Veettanaiththirkum Adhigaariyaaga Erpaduththinaan.
11 pinbu Egipthu Kaanaan Ennum Dhesangalilengum Panjamum Migundha Varuththamum Undaagi, Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalukku Aagaaram Kidaiyaamarpoyitru.
12 appozhudhu Egipthile Dhaaniyam Undendru Yaakkobu Kelvippattu Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalai Mudhalaandharam Anuppinaan.
13 randaandharam Yoseppu Thannudaiya Sagodhararukkuth Thannaith Theriyappaduththinaan. Yoseppudaiya Vamsamum Paarvonukkuk Theriyavandhadhu.
14 pinbu Yoseppu, Thannudaiya Thagappan Yaakkobum Thannudaiya Inaththaar Yaavarumaagiya, Ezhubaththaindhuperai Azhaikka Anuppinaan.
15 andhappadi Yaakkobu Egipthukkupponaan. Avanum Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalum Mariththu,
16 angeyirundhu Seegemukkuk Konduvarappattu, Aabiragaam Seegemin Thagappanaagiya Emorudaiya Sandhadhiyaaridaththil Rokkakkirayaththukku Vaangiyirundha Kallaraiyil Vaikkappattaargal.
17 aabiragaamukku Dhevan Aanaiyittu Arulina Vaakkuththaththam Niraiverunkaalam Sameebiththabodhu,
18 yoseppai Ariyaadha Veroru Raajaa Thondrina Kaalamalavum, Janangal Egipthile Palugip Peruginaargal.

19 avan Nammudaiya Janangalai Vanjanaiyaai Nadappiththu, Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalin Kuzhandhaigal Uyirodiraadhapadikku Avargal Avaigalai Veliye Pottuvidumpadi Seydhu, Avargalai Ubaththiravappaduththinaan.
20 akkaalaththile Mose Pirandhu, Dhivviya Savundhariyamullavanaayirundhu, Moondru Maadhamalavum Than Thagappan Veettile Valarkkappattaan.
21 avan Veliye Pottuvidappattabodhu, Paarvonudaiya Kumaaraththi Avanai Eduththuth Thanakkup Pillaiyaaga Valarththaal.
22 mose Egipthiyarudaiya Sagala Saasthirangalilum Karpikkappattu, Vaakkilum Seygaiyilum Vallavanaanaan.
23 avanukku Naarpadhu Vayadhaanabodhu, Isravel Buththiraraagiya Thannudaiya Sagodhararaik Kandu Sandhikkumpadi Avanudaiya Irudhayaththil Ennamundaayitru.
24 appozhudhu Avargalil Oruvan Aniyaayamaai Nadaththappadugiradhai Avan Kandu, Avanukkuth Thunainindru, Egipthiyanai Vetti, Thunbappattavanukku Niyaayanjseydhaan.
25 thannudaiya Kaiyinaale Dhevan Thangalukku Ratchippaith Tharuvaarenbadhaith Thannudaiya Sagodharar Arindhukolvaargalendru Avan Ninaiththaan; Avargalo Adhai Ariyavillai.

26 marunaalile Sandaipannikkondirukkira Iranduperukku Avan Edhirppattu: Manushare, Neengal Sagodhararaayirukkireergal: Oruvarukkoruvar Aniyaayanjseygiradhenna Endru, Avargalaich Samaadhaanappaduththumpadi Pesinaan.
27 piranukku Aniyaayanjseydhavan Avanaip Pidiththuth Thalli Engalmel Adhigaariyaagavum Niyaayaadhibadhiyaagavum Unnai Erpaduththinavan Yaar?
28 netru Nee Andha Egipthiyanaikkondradhupola Ennaiyum Kondrupoda Manadhaayirukkiraayo Endraan.
29 indha Vaarththaiyinimiththam Mose Odippoi, Meedhiyaan Dhesaththile Sanjariththukkondirundhaan; Ange Irukkumbodhu Avanukku Irandu Kumaarargal Pirandhaargal.
30 naarpadhu Varusham Sendrapinbu, Seenaaimalaiyin Vanaandharaththile Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Mutchedi Erigira Akkinijuvaalaiyile Avanukkuth Dharisanamaanaar.
31 mose Andhath Dharisanaththaikkandu, Adhisayappattu, Adhai Utruppaarkkumpadi Sameebiththuvarugaiyil:

32 naan Aabiragaamin Dhevanum Eesaakkin Dhevanum Yaakkobin Dhevanumaagiya Un Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevanaayirukkiren Endru Karththar Thiruvulampatrina Saththam Avanukku Undaayitru. Appozhudhu Mose Nadukkamadaindhu, Utruppaarkkath Thuniyaamalirundhaan.
33 pinnum Karththar Avanai Nokki: Un Paadhangalilirukkira Paadharatchaigalaik Kazhatrippotu; Nee Nirkira Idam Parisuththa Boomiyaayirukkiradhu.

34 egipthilirukkira En Janaththin Ubaththiravaththai Naan Paarkkave Paarththu, Avargal Perumoochchaikkettu, Avargalai Viduvikkumpadi Iranginen; Aagaiyaal, Nee Vaa Naan Unnai Egipthirku Anuppuven Endraar.

35 unnai Adhigaariyaagavum Niyaayaadhibadhiyaagavum Erpaduththinavan Yaarendru Solli Avargal Marudhaliththirundha Indha Moseyaiththaane Dhevan, Mutchediyil Avanukkuth Dharisanamaana Thoodhanaale Thalaivanaagavum Meetpanaagavum Anuppinaar.

36 ivane Avargalai Angeyirundhu Azhaiththuvandhu, Egipthu Dhesaththileyum Sivandha Samuththiraththileyum, Naarpadhu Varushakaalamaai Vanaandharaththileyum, Arpudhangalaiyum Adaiyaalangalaiyum Seydhaan.

37 isravel Buththirarai Nokki: Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungal Sagodhararilirundhu Ennaippola Oru Theerkkadharisiyai Ungalukkaaga Ezhumbappannuvaar, Avarukkuch Sevikoduppeergalaaga Endru Sonnavan Indha Moseye.
38 seenaaimalaiyil Thannudane Pesina Thoodhanodum Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalodunkooda Vanaandharaththile Sabaikkullirundhavanum, Namakkuk Kodukkumpadi Jeevavaakkiyangalaip Petravanum Ivane.
39 ivanukku Nammudaiya Pidhaakkal Keezhppadiya Manadhaayiraamal, Ivanaiththallivittu, Thangal Irudhayangalile Egipthukkuth Thirumbi,
40 aaronai Nokki: Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Engalai Azhaiththukkonduvandha Andha Mosekku Enna Sambaviththadho Ariyom; Aadhalaal Engalukku Munsellum Dheyvangalai Engalukku Undupannum Endru Solli;
41 annaatkalil Oru Kandrukkuttiyai Undupanni, Andha Vikkiragaththirkup Baliyittu, Thangal Kaiyin Kiriyaigalil Kalikoorndhaargal.

42 appozhudhu Dhevan Avargalaivittu Vilagi, Vaanasenaikku Aaraadhanaiseyya Avargalai Oppukkoduththaar. Adhaikkuriththu: Isravel Vamsaththaare, Neengal Vanaandharaththilirundha Naarpadhu Varushamvaraiyil Kaanikkaigalaiyum Baligalaiyum Enakkuch Seluththineergalo Endrum,

43 panindhukollumpadi Neengal Undaakkina Soroobangalaagiya Molokinudaiya Koodaaraththaiyum, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Rempaan Ennum Natchaththira Soroobaththaiyum Sumandheergale, Aagaiyaal Ungalaip Baabilonukku Appuraththile Kudipogappannuven Endrum, Theerkkadharisigalin Buththagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe.

44 melum Nee Paarththa Maadhiriyinpadiye Saatchiyin Koodaaraththai Undupannuvaayaaga Endru Moseyudane Pesinavar Kattalaiyitta Piragaaramaaga, Andhak Koodaaram Vanaandharaththile Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalodu Irundhadhu.

45 melum, Yosuvaavudanekooda Nammudaiya Pidhaakkal Adhaip Petrukkondu, Dhevan Avargalukku Munbaagath Thuraththivitta Purajaadhigaludaiya Dhesaththai Avargal Kattikkollugaiyil, Adhai Andha Dhesaththil Kondu, Thaaveedhin Naalvaraikkum Vaiththirundhaargal.
46 ivan Dhevanidaththil Dhayavu Petrapadiyinaal, Yaakkobin Dhevanukku Oru Vaasasthalaththaith Thaan Kattavendumendru Vinnappampanninaan.
47 saalomono Avarukku Aalayaththaik Kattinaan.
48 aagilum Unnadhamaanavar Kaigalinaal Seyyappatta Aalayangalil Vaasamaayiraar.
49 vaanam Enakkuch Singaasanamum Boomi Enakkup Paadhapadiyumaayirukkiradhu; Enakkaaga Neengal Eppadippatta Veettaik Kattuveergal, Naan Thangiyirukkaththakka Sthalam Edhu;
50 ivaigal Ellaavatraiyum Ennudaiya Karam Undaakkavillaiyaa Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Theerkkadharisi Solliyirukkiraane.
51 vanangaak Kazhuththullavargale, Irudhayaththilum Sevigalilum Viruththasedhanam Peraadhavargale, Ungal Pidhaakkalaippola Neengalum Parisuththa Aavikku Eppozhudhum Edhirththunirkireergal.

52 theerkkadharisigalil Yaarai Ungal Pidhaakkal Thunbappaduththaamalirundhaargal? Needhibararudaiya Varugaiyai Munnariviththavargalaiyum Avargal Kolaiseydhaargal. Ippozhudhu Neengal Avarukkuth Thurogigalum, Avaraik Kolaiseydha Paadhagarumaayirukkireergal.
53 dhevathoodharaikkondu Neengal Niyaayappiramaanaththaip Petrirundhum, Adhaik Kaikkollaamarponeergal Endraan.
54 ivaigalai Avargal Kettapozhudhu, Moorkkamadaindhu, Avanaip Paarththup Pallaik Kadiththaargal.
55 avan Parisuththa Aaviyile Niraindhadhavanaai, Vaanaththai Annaandhupaarththu: Dhevanudaiya Magimaiyaiyum, Dhevanudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Yesu Nirkiradhaiyum Kandu;
56 adho Vaanangal Thirandhirukkiradhaiyum, Manushakumaaran Dhevanudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Nirkiradhaiyum Kaangiren Endraan.
57 appozhudhu Avargal Uraththasaththamaaik Kookkuralittuth Thangal Kaadhugalai Adaiththukkondu, Orumanappattu Avanmel Paaindhu,
58 avanai Nagaraththukkup Purambe Thalli Avanaik Kallerindhaargal. Saatchikkaarar Thangal Vasthirangalaik Kazhatri, Savul Ennappatta Oru Vaalibanudaiya Paadhaththinaruge Vaiththaargal
59 appozhudhu. Karththaraagiya Yesuve, En Aaviyai Etrukkollumendru Sthevaan Thozhudhukollugaiyil, Avanaik Kallerindhaargal.
60 avano Muzhangaarpadiyittu: Aandavare, Ivargalmel Indhap Paavaththaich Sumaththaadhirum Endru Migundha Saththamittuch Sonnaan. Ippadich Solli, Niththiraiyadaindhaan.
